document.docAuthor: Maxwell J. Bernt & James S. Albert
document.masterDocTitle: A New Species of Deep-channel Electric Knifefish Compsaraia (Apteronotidae, Gymnotiformes) from the Amazon River

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A New Species of Deep-channel Electric Knifefish Compsaraia (Apteronotidae, Gymnotiformes) from the Amazon River

subSubSection.paragraph: Brazil: Amazonas: ANSP 185098, 3, 1 CS, 141–162, Rio Içá, 9 km downriver of Betânia, 10.9 km upriver of Santo Antônio do Içá, 3°9"1" "S, 68°1"23" "W; ANSP 189212, 2, 140–221, Rio Negro, 18.6 km downriver of Moura, 13.5 km upriver of São Francisco, 1°34"23 " "S, 61°29"48" "W; FMNH 115054, 3, 185–197, Rio Negro, between tributaries Cuieras and Tarumã-Açu, between towns Santa Maria and Leprosário, 0 3°0 1"4 5" "S, 6 0°2 4"0 7" "W; FMNH 1 1 5 0 5 7, 2, Rio Negro, between Paraná da Floresta and Paraná da Cotia, between towns Moura and São Francisco, 0 1°33"43" "S, 61°30"25" "W; FMNH 115060, 12, 180–241, Rio Negro, between tributaries Curidique and Paraná Jacaré, between towns Novo Caioẽ and São Francisco de Assis, 0 1°5 8"3 0" "S, 61°1 4"2 0" "W; FMNH 115061, 1, 201, Rio Negro, between Paraná do Cantagalo and Paraná das Onças, between São Francisco and São Francisco de Assis, 0 1°4 4"1 9 " "S, 0 6 1°2 5"0 1" "W; FMNH 128401, 1, Rio Solimões, small side channel near Tefé, 3°19"54" "S, 64°40"33.6" "W. Pará: ANSP 197672, 11, 140–204, Rio Xingu at mouth of Rio Jaraucu, 1°4 9 "0 8.5 " "S, 52°14"25.8" "W; FMNH 114945, 13, 109–150, Rio Amazonas, between Furo de Urucuricaia and Paraná dos Arraiolos, between towns Almeirim and Gurupá, 0 1°2 9 "1 1 " "S, 0 52°0 9"46" "W; FMNH 114973, 27, 61–125, Rio Amazonas, between Furo do Surubim-Acu and Rio Tapajós, between towns Cab eca D ’ O nca an d S antar ém, 0 2°2 2 "3 4 " "S, 0 54°43"29" "W. Peru: Loreto: ANSP 178274, 2, 165–188, Rio Amazonas near Iquitos; ANSP 182209, 2, PT, 132–188, Rio Amazonas, near Iquitos, 3°4 3"2 1" "S, 7 3°1 2"1 4" "W; ANSP 182214, 1, PT, 159, Rio Amazonas near mouth of Rio Itaya at Iquitos, 3°40"36 " "S, 73°14"37" "W; FLMNH 122826, 1, 209, Rio Amazonas, near Iquitos; MUSM 54620, 43, 3 CS, 110– 181, Rio Nanay near Iquitos, 3°44"3.33" "S, 73°17"22.54 " "W; MUSM 546 3 8, 10, 68–15 1, Rio Amazonas near Iquitos, 3°49"11.5" "S, 73°0 9"31.2" "W. Madre de Dios: MUSM 36716, 1, 292, Rio Las Piedras, downstream from Santa Terezita, 12°30"29" "S, 69°15"14 " "W; MUSM 37150, 1, 259, Rio Madre de Dios, 5 km downstream of bridge at Puerto Maldonado, 12°35"51.2" "S, 69°8"43.4" "W; MUSM 37172, 6, 3 CS, 185–227, Rio Madre de Dios at mouth of Rio Tambopata, near Puerto Maldonado, 12°35"34.5" "S, 69°9"38.1" "W.
